Header: “The Peanut Butter Falcon” scheduled to be released this Friday
Content: “The Peanut Butter Falcon” is a 2019 American comedy drama film directed and written by Tyler Nilson and Michael Schwartz and starring Shia LaBeouf, Dakota Johnson and Bruce Dern. A young boy with Down syndrome runs away to fulfill his dream of becoming a professional wrestler. It is scheduled to be released this Friday by Roadside Attractions.
